verses.verse: The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4427>reigneth;<s%> let the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1523>rejoice;<s%> let the <S%H7227>multitude<s%> of <S%H339>isles<s%> be <S%H8055>glad<s%> thereof.
Clouds <S%H6051><s%> and <S%H6205>darkness<s%> are round <S%H5439>about<s%> him: <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> and <S%H4941>judgment<s%> are the <S%H4349>habitation<s%> of his <S%H3678>throne.<s%>
A <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H1980>goeth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him, and burneth <S%H3857>up<s%> his <S%H6862>enemies<s%> round <S%H5439>about.<s%>

The <S%H2022>hills<s%> <S%H4549>melted<s%> like <S%H1749>wax<s%> at the <S%H4480>presence<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> at the <S%H4480>presence<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H113>Lord<s%> of the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth.<s%>

Confounded <S%H954><s%> be <S%H3605>all<s%> they that <S%H5647>serve<s%> graven <S%H6459>images,<s%> that boast <S%H1984>themselves<s%> of <S%H457>idols:<s%> <S%H7812>worship<s%> him, <S%H3605>all<s%> ye <S%H430>gods.<s%>

Zion <S%H6726><s%> <S%H8085>heard,<s%> and was <S%H8055>glad;<s%> and the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1523>rejoiced<s%> because <S%H4616>of<s%> thy <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Ye that <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H7451>evil:<s%> he <S%H8104>preserveth<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> of his <S%H2623>saints;<s%> he <S%H5337>delivereth<s%> them out of the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
Light <S%H216><s%> is <S%H2232>sown<s%> for the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> and <S%H8057>gladness<s%> for the <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
Rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> ye <S%H6662>righteous;<s%> and give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> at the <S%H2143>remembrance<s%> of his <S%H6944>holiness.<s%>
